text: Basically they were just saying I'm trying to do too much and being a bit over ambitious. Which I'm fine with they just told me to say I'm going to do one scene, perfect that one and then after that, move onto another one and to say that the next one is an optional extra.
Then I wasn't clear enough in what I was trying to achieve and then they started talking about the differences between WW1 & WW2 :joy:

Classic lecturers :joy:

But yeah I think they have a point with trying to master one thing rather than not being able to get everything to the level it needs to be if that makes sense.

Yeah 100% agree with it. I'm just not sure what to do now :tired_face: haha. What do you reckon? Should I literally do one thing like roto work with some tracking thrown in and that it or something else?
